name: Space Engineers

task.description: Installing .NET 4.7.2. This will take a while...
task.name: winetricks

content:
files:
- dx2010: https://lutris.net/files/tools/directx-2010.tar.gz
game:
  appid: 244850
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/dxsetup
    file: dx2010
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /silent
    executable: $CACHE/dxsetup/DXSETUP.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: vcrun2017 xact
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: dotnet472 win7
    arch: win64
    description: Installing .NET 4.7.2. This will take a while...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
winesteam:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  version: tkg-protonified-4.6-x86_64
